snippet: Tania Bruguera, who advocates free speech in her native country, was arrested for the third time in two days.
abstract: Supporters of Cuban performance artist Tania Bruguera say she has been arrested for third time in two days, along with other dissidents, after demanding release of opponents of the government arrested in earlier crackdown.
lead_paragraph: Tania Bruguera, who advocates free speech in her native country, was arrested for the third time in two days.

headline.main: Cuba Again Arrests Artist Seeking Dissidents’ Release
headline.print_headline: Cuba Again Arrests Artist Seeking Dissidents’ Release

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
